definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Systems that use hydrogen chloride must be kept extremely dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用氯化氢的系统必须保持非常干燥。

sentences.english: Residual or process hydrogen chloride within the system should be disposed of using a caustic scrubber.
sentences.chinese: 在系统内的残留氯化氢应该用腐蚀性擦洗器处理。

sentences.english: HC1 and PCDD/Fs emission can be reduced effectively by introducing calcium base.
sentences.chinese: 钙基的加入可以有效降低氯化氢和二恶英的排放。

sentences.english: Dehydrochlorination reaction can be prevented effectively while adding stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 加入稳定剂能有效的防止脱氯化氢反应。

sentences.english: Anhydrous hydrogen chloride is considered non-corrosive.
sentences.chinese: 无水氯化氢被认为是没有腐蚀性的。

sentences.english: The rings are opened with hydrogen chloride and deuterium chloride.
sentences.chinese: 应用氯化氢和氯化氘打开沅环。

sentences.english: It is noncorrosive in the anhydrous state.
sentences.chinese: 在无水状态氯化氢没有腐蚀性。

sentences.english: One of the greatest vulnerabilities of hydrogen chloride tube trailers is the involvement in a transportation accident.
sentences.chinese: 氯化氢管道拖车的最大弱点之一是卷入交通事故。

sentences.english: Chlorine-37 likes to bond with hydrogen and vaporize out as hydrogen chloride.
sentences.chinese: 氯37容易与氢元素化合，以氯化氢的形式蒸发出来。

sentences.english: The present running situation on diad graphite synthetic furnace producing hydrogen chloride is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了二合一石墨合成炉制氯化氢的运行状况。

sentences.english: The method of purifying hydrogen chloride is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种氯化氢精制技术。

sentences.english: But this process also released large amounts of deadly hydrochloric acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个过程同时也释放了大量的氯化氢酸性气体。
